channel.title: Please take down, forgot to get permission.... :fp:
channel.description:
Well ladies and gentle men, I am releasing this because a while back I use to play this server called Battlescape562, really great owner and all... Had tons of players and great server overall.... Any who, ever since that day I was hoping I could create something just like that..... So here is the closest I got to the Battlescape I use to know and play. :D
I will show you what looks like battlescape in general, and then what the "remix" part would be. :D
Original Battlescape (in my eyes or from what I remember):
Original Battlescape562 Home [IMG]http://i778.photobucket.com/albums/yy69/korydogg5/Battlescape562remixhome.jpg[/img]
Remix Battlescape 562 Donatorzone [IMG]http://i778.photobucket.com/albums/yy69/korydogg5/Battlescape562DoantorZoneRemix.jpg[/img]
Remix Battlescape562 Bork [IMG]http://i778.photobucket.com/albums/yy69/korydogg5/Battlescape562Bork.jpg[/img]
Original Battlescape562 Train [IMG]http://i778.photobucket.com/albums/yy69/korydogg5/Battlescape562Train.jpg[/img]
Will add more pictures later.. Any who here are the credits!!!!! Laakerules-80% ParadoxTM-20%
Source: Client:
Use your own cache! :D
